name: Space Delivery (melonium)
description:
You are a space delivery service, but your ship was crashed.

Deliver the highly valuable, highly volatile packet while in vacuum of space.

You only have your oxygen tank to move though...

How to Play:

- Click anywhere to "shoot" your o2 reserve

- Bring the energy core to the end

- You can push the core by "blowing" it

- Esc to pause
